Title.evidence: Randomised Controlled Trial of a Frailty Education Module for Surgical Residents

Trial_Design.evidence: In this randomised controlled trial, traditional track cardiothoracic surgery residents were randomised

Intervention.evidence: randomised to either an online frailty education module (experimental group) or no training (control group)

Objective.evidence: This study aimed to evaluate the impact of a frailty education module on residents' risk assessment for lobectomy.

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was the change in risk estimates, measured immediately after video viewing.

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: Randomisation was computer-generated, and allocation was concealed.

Number_Randomised.evidence: Forty-one residents were randomised (20 experimental, 21 control)

Result_Outcome.evidence: Video viewing significantly altered risk estimates (frail: 50±75% increase, p=0.008; vigorous: 14±32% decrease, p=0.043)
